descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
4 PLAYER CO-OP MODE

Take your friends with you and explore the wild rainforest, build brand-new wooden, bamboo, and mud structures. Set up hunts, defend against predators and hostile tribes, all the while enjoying the rhythmic sounds of drums and rattles. For those seeking even more adventures with friends, Spirits of Amazonia: Part 1 is now available in co-op mode!

[media]

Green Hell VR is the most authentic story-driven VR survival game, where you must use real-life wilderness skills. Collect, craft, and carry everything you need while defending against wild animals inside a hostile Amazon jungle to feel like an elite survivalist.

[media]

Survive and follow the thrilling story of anthropologist Jake Higgins in search of his missing wife in the full story campaign for Green Hell VR. 
The game also features "Spirits of Amazonia: Part 1" - a free prequel story expansion, with an additional 10+ hours of challenging gameplay.

[media]
[media]
